text:
Inland Fisheries (Inland Waters) Order 1997

I make the following order under section 5 of the Inland Fisheries Act 1995 with the agreement of the Minister responsible for the administration of the Living Marine Resources Management Act 1995 .

12 February 1997

T. JOHN CLEARY

Minister for Inland Fisheries

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Inland Fisheries (Inland Waters) Order 1997 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Interpretation
    In this order,
        Act means the Inland fisheries Act 1995 ;

4. Inland waters
    The following are inland waters for the purpose of the Act:
            (a) waters that are to the landward of the seaward limits of rivers specified in the order made, and in force, under section 6(1) of the Act;
            (b) waters that are to the landward of the seaward limit of a river referred to in section 6(3) of the Act.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 February 1997

This order is administered in the Department of Environment and Land Management.
